name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Dongguan, Guangdong, Fenggang Town was exposed for withholding wages for sanitation workers. The workers went on strike, leaving the streets unattended and a large amount of garbage scattered next to the trash cans.
A video showed workers gathering at the Fenggang Town Government to defend their rights. The video poster said that they had not been paid for two months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Shanghai, netizens used cameras to record the Shanghai South Railway Station in the early hours of the morning. Some people slept on the floor outside the railway station to save on accommodation costs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, two students from the No. 1 Middle School in Huangzhong District, Xining City, Qinghai Province, died of Neisseria meningitidis.
On July 4, the Xining government announced that all teachers and students in the class were suspended from classes, and were not allowed to go out or gather unless necessary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Shandong. A "Ding Yizhen-style window" appeared at the Pingdu Citizen Service Center, requiring residents to kneel or bend over to consult.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 3, a segment in the TV series "The Police Chief" in which the household registration window refused to issue temporary residence permits to outsiders and the new chief solved the problem domineeringly was ridiculed by many netizens. Netizens called it a "sci-fi film"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 3, the Urban Management Bureau of Chifeng City, Inner Mongolia was cancelled and its assets and debts were taken over by the Urban Operation Center.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Dongguan, Guangdong. A woman posted a video saying that her husband worked at Weiqin Motor Hardware Co., Ltd. He died in the dormitory in the early morning of July 2, but the factory did not give the family a specific reply and locked the door to prevent the family from entering the factory. The family knelt outside the door and cried: Who will give us justice? We have been here for three days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Many students reported that the China Academy of Art started military training on July 1, during which a number of students had fever and ruptured meniscus cysts. The school not only refused to grant leave, but also required students to continue training in the high temperature and threatened students not to speak out about the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Shanghai Stock Exchange has put forward specific requirements for securities companies: sing the bright prospects of China's economy and be good at counter-cyclical layout.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guangdong, a netizen posted that he was asked about his age during an interview at Luckin Coffee. After learning that he was 26 years old, the store manager said that it was beyond their budget and that they needed young and energetic people, and they were afraid that there would be a generation gap in the conversation with them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Jinan water situation

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 2, lawyer Wang Cailiang posted a video saying that recently, bloody incidents caused by disputes between grassroots neighbors and officials and the public have occurred frequently.
If law enforcement officers bully the weak, they will ultimately harm others and themselves. Logically speaking, when encountering such things, lawyers should advise victims to defend their rights according to the law, but I think many lawyers can't say this now. Because you and I don't have sufficient reasons and cases to make those who are demolished believe in the law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6, Yueyang, Hunan. Some netizens reported that they live-broadcasted the water conditions of Dongting Lake, but their live-broadcast room was banned by the platform because they filmed dangerous areas.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 5, a breach occurred in the dike of Dongting Lake in Huarong County, Yueyang, Hunan. However, when blocking the breach, the trucks were loaded with loose sand, and there were banners on the trucks, which was questioned by netizens for formalism, asking why the sand was not bagged.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 5, it was reported that the Dongting Lake levee broke and 5,000 people were urgently evacuated. However, a video released by local residents on the 6th showed that there were still residents trapped and waiting for rescue. Some residents sat on the levee with their remaining luggage for a whole night and said that the government did not allow them to set up tents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens found that on June 17, Huarong County Party Secretary Tao Weijun came to Tuanzhou to supervise flood prevention and preparedness work, and pointed out that the whole county should strengthen its sense of responsibility, resolutely win the tough battle of flood prevention and preparedness, and do its utmost to protect the lives and property of the people.
According to a report on June 30, local party organization cadres at all levels in Huarong County acted upon hearing the news and responded to the news, using responsibility and commitment to build a strong red embankment. As of now, there are only 4 comments left on this video. 4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report in 2022, the construction period of the key embankment reinforcement project in the Dongting Lake area is 45 months, with an estimated total investment of 8.5 billion yuan. This was ridiculed and questioned by netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was reported online that in Yiyang, Hunan, a man broke down while holding his mobile phone and drove his car into a flood to commit suicide.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on July 4, the Natural Resources Bureau of Yan'an City, Shaanxi Province recently responded that it will take various positive measures to fully revitalize old residential land, release land resources that are not used reasonably, and meet the land needs of retired cadres and employees who return to their hometowns to build new houses without occupying arable land.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Henan Qinyang City Traditional Chinese Medicine Hospital, wages have not been paid for half a year, bonuses have not been paid for a year, and now they allow pyramid schemes to give lectures in the hospital

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the media reported that the amount of corporate disaster relief donations this year has dropped significantly, and the entertainment industry's disaster relief efforts have been relatively quiet.
In response to this, blogger "Lao Meng Shuo Shi'er" commented: This year's situation just shows that both companies and people are living more and more rationally and soberly. The flood is so big that donating 100 can make 99, and it also washes into other people's golden rice bowls. Don't look at those people so arrogant now, it's not far from the time when they close down and lose their jobs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 4, it was revealed online that a female student from Shaanxi Yan'an Middle School was called to the office by her class teacher and scolded for a long time because she did not participate in the July 1st Party Founding Day activities organized by the school. At noon, the girl did not return to the dormitory, but wrote a suicide note and tried to jump from the fifth floor of the teaching building. She was rescued by other students. The class teacher also insulted the girl for why she didn't die. No one expected that less than 20 minutes after being pulled down, the girl rushed out again and jumped from the fifth floor. The school did not

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the famous "Internet celebrity" graffiti wall in Anyang, Henan was cleaned up by the urban management, and a large number of cameras were installed and people were sent to guard it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 6, a netizen in Hohhot photographed a Russian Il-76 transport plane taking off from Hohhot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6 (Release) A netizen posted a video saying that an aunt came to Moscow alone and said that "Putin" invited her. It is likely that she was deceived but did not want to return to China. She was stopped by the Moscow police many times. I hope her children will contact her as soon as possible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Hengyang, Hunan. At the demolition site on Damingcheng Road, an old man stood on the roof holding a kitchen knife to resist the demolition, but the building was eventually demolished.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Changsha, Hunan. A man posted a video saying that someone on Changsha Metro Line 6 was wearing Japanese clothes and holding a Japanese samurai sword, "not ashamed, but proud." Afterwards, the man ran to the Changsha Public Affairs Center and believed that the police and traffic management department had ideological problems.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 1, Taiyuan, Shanxi. On July 1, the Party Founding Day, the Beiji Palace Taoist Temple held a flag-raising ceremony.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of July 6, Panzhihua, Sichuan.
The wall of Huacheng Foreign Language School collapsed, fortunately it happened at night

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: An elderly man from Henan tells his experience during the three-year famine. "Seven people starved to death in one village, and they kept asking for steamed buns until they died."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 5, Dongguan, Guangdong. Netizens posted a video saying that an auxiliary police officer came to their door at 11pm and asked them to download an anti-fraud app. After being rejected, the police officer said, "It's mainly for your own good."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 6, Guangxi University of Science and Technology urgently notified all classes to check students with passports, especially those who are unemployed.
The reason is unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up to the mandatory military training for sick students at the China Academy of Art
On July 6, students infected with the coronavirus can rest at home.

Netizen contribution
On the July 5th episode of "Singer", the lyrics of the famous song "Jiang Hu Liu" by the Chinese rap group C-BLOCK were changed beyond recognition, and netizens joked that it was changed to "Harmony Liu".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 6, protesters at Wuyue Plaza in Tianjin Binhai New Area demanded their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 6, Beijing. Two petitioners were forcibly carried away by several interception officers in the Yongdingmen underground passage.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 6, cattle were flooded after the Dongting Lake burst its dikes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Yan'an Middle School informed all students after the suicide, and will take serious action against the relevant personnel. At the same time, students are required not to publish, comment or forward the incident.
There are also reports that some students have been taken to the police station for questioning because they posted the incident online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 4, Wanning, Hainan. A primary school student was injured in the school at Haizhinan Experimental School and died after failed rescue efforts. His family members were outside the school gate to seek justice. On July 5, the official announcement was issued, but the announcement did not mention the cause of the student's death or the details.
According to local netizens, the student was playing with the steel bars of the mosquito net in the dormitory on campus, and then slipped and stabbed the body with the steel bars. The dormitory aunt took away the steel bars without authorization, causing the wound to become infected and die.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 6, Beijing also began to check electric vehicles

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of July 5, a knife attack occurred in Dagujing Street, Jianyang City, Sichuan Province. Local residents said that a man attacked two women.
Police report: 2 people were injured, but not in danger of life. A 54-year-old man was arrested for intentionally injuring others due to a dispute over trivial matters in life.
